mapper.select: SELECT role_id FROM alink.f_user_role WHERE user_id=#{uid}

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,count(t3.id) as meshNum,t2.account as account,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_date,DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date FROM alink.f_project AS t1 INNER JOIN alink.f_user_account AS t2 ON t1.uid = t2.id INNER JOIN alink.f_mesh AS t3 ON t1.id = t3.project_id GROUP BY t3.project_id ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC
SELECT uid FROM alink.f_user_customer WHERE fid=(SELECT fid FROM f_user_customer WHERE uid=#{uid})

SELECT t1.id,t1.name,count(t3.id) as meshNum,t2.account as account,DATE_FORMAT(t1.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_date,DATE_FORMAT(t1.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_date FROM (SELECT * FROM alink.f_project WHERE uid = #{uid}) AS t1 INNER JOIN alink.f_user_account AS t2 ON t1.uid = t2.id INNER JOIN alink.f_mesh AS t3 ON t1.id = t3.project_id GROUP BY t3.project_id ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC
